==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|めい|じつ|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|めいじつ}}

# in [[name]] and [[reality]]; [[nominally]] and [[virtually]]; [[form]] and [[contents]]

====Idioms====
* [[名実共に備わる]]
*: めいじつともにそなわる
*: ''meijitsu tomoni sonawaru''
*: live up to one's name

* {{l|ja|名実相伴う}}
*: めいじつあいともなう
*: ''meijitsu aitomonau''
*: something's name equals what it really is; something deserves its name

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|なみ}}

# Nami, a female Japanese given name
